name: Chain Dungeons
description:
Chain together dungeon levels to create your own adventure!

Created by:

Art and Animation - Ian Ortiz Duran (https://www.artstation.com/ian_od, https://ianod.itch.io/)

Programming and Composition - Mitchell Tsutsulis (mitchell444999@protonmail.com, https://mitchelltsutsulis.com)

Sound Design, Audio Mixing and Level Design - Efe Vardarli (efevardarli@gmail.com, https://noteefy.itch.io/)

Used font is ‘Dungeon’ by Saesarez Novandito (saesarez.novandito@gmail.com)
